product_metafields.name: Badges
product_metafields.description: Product badges: best-seller, nouveau, stock-limite, livraison-offerte. Sale % is computed from compare-at price.

product_metafields.name: Rating (fallback)
product_metafields.description: Display rating (1–5) when reviews app is not installed. Used only if product.metafields.reviews.rating is blank.

product_metafields.name: Review count (fallback)
product_metafields.description: Display review count when reviews app is not installed. Used only if product.metafields.reviews.count is blank.

product_metafields.name: Rating breakdown (optional)
product_metafields.description: Optional. PDP rating breakdown: comma-separated star:percent (e.g. 5:80,4:15,3:3,2:1,1:1). If blank, theme estimates from average rating.

product_metafields.name: Intensity
product_metafields.description: Fragrance intensity level for filtering and display.
product_metafields.admin_instructions: In Shopify Admin: Settings → Custom data → Products → Add definition. Type: Single line text (or use a metafield definition with predefined list if available).

product_metafields.name: Fragrance family
product_metafields.description: Olfactory family (e.g. Woody, Fresh, Floral, Oriental).

product_metafields.name: Coverage / Days
product_metafields.description: For diffusers: coverage in sq ft. For oils: approximate days of use or room size.

product_metafields.name: Inspired by
product_metafields.description: Designer or fragrance inspiration (e.g. Bleu de Chanel style).

product_metafields.name: Ingredients
product_metafields.description: Ingredients list for product page accordion.

product_metafields.name: FAQ questions
product_metafields.description: FAQ questions (paired with faq_answers by index).

product_metafields.name: FAQ answers
product_metafields.description: FAQ answers (paired with faq_questions by index).

shopify_admin_steps: 1. Go to Settings → Custom data → Products
2. Add definitions for each key above under namespace 'custom' (or create namespace 'custom' first)
3. For intensity: use Single line text, or create a Metaobject with list and reference it
4. After products exist, fill metafields per product (Bulk editor or product edit page)
